name: WeSMART
0:
”Alexa, turn on Air conditioner”
”Alexa, turn on curtains”
”Alexa, turn on Headlight”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Follow the below steps:
1. On your smartphone, open the Alexa app and tap the menu icon in the screen's upper left corner, and then tap “Skills & Games", search for “WeSMART”
2. Tap on WeSMART skill listed, click Enable and enter your gateway ID and password
3. After the binding, open the Alexa app and choose "Discover devices" to sync all your devices to Alexa.
 
Supported types:
1. Switches, fans, dimmers,..
2. Air conditioner: Set temperature, mode, swing, fan speed.
3. TV
and more
